title: League Firsts Board

properties.name: description
properties.value: The League Firsts Board is a notice board found next to the Leagues Tutor in the Lumbridge Castle courtyard. It lists the first players to achieve certain tasks during the Twisted League, Trailblazer League, and Shattered Relics League.

content:
League Firsts Board
Released14 November 2019 (Update)
MembersNo
QuestNo
LocationLumbridge Castle
OptionsRead
ExamineA notice board detailing some notable achievements.
Map
Advanced data
Object ID37482

The League Firsts Board is a notice board found next to the Leagues Tutor in the Lumbridge Castle courtyard. It lists the first players to achieve certain tasks during the Twisted League, Trailblazer League, and Shattered Relics League.

Shattered Relics[edit | edit source]

First to Player Date achieved
Achieve a level 99 skill MagnumCopus 19 January 2022
Obtain a Pet Xello 19 January 2022
Complete an Elite Diary Neyes 22 January 2022
Complete a Master Clue Scroll Burbob 21 January 2022
Get a Fragment to level 3 MagnumCopus 19 January 2022
Unlock all Fragments CanNotLogIn 25 January 2022
Unlock all skills Daniiex 20 January 2022
Unlock all bosses Crowride1873 26 January 2022
Achieve tier 5 Dav3y 19 January 2022
Achieve tier 6 mvng 20 January 2022
Achieve tier 7 mvng 22 January 2022
Achieve tier 5 without unlocking hitpoints Dav3y 19 January 2022
Achieve tier 6 without unlocking hitpoints MagnumCopus 22 January 2022
Achieve tier 7 without unlocking hitpoints MagnumCopus 24 January 2022
Complete all easy combat achievements lookwes5east 21 January 2022
Complete all medium combat achievements BrettyBear 26 January 2022
Complete all hard combat achievements BrettyBear 8 February 2022
Complete all elite combat achievements A f r a i d 24 February 2022
Complete all master combat achievements RevnantSlave 10 March 2022
Complete all grandmaster combat achievements RevnantSlave 10 March 2022

First to Player Date achieved
Obtain a pet 2MinNoodles 28 October 2020

& Leafy Lake 		31 October 2020
Catch a dark crab Craaaaaab 28 October 2020

Defeat 'The Rabbit' Kyle1jk 30 October 2020
Receive a Pharaoh's sceptre GroupBusX 28 October 2020
Defeat the Kalphite Queen Scoutzone 29 October 2020
Build a gilded altar Nyanaro 30 October 2020
Defeat all three Dagannoth Kings yp 30 October 2020
